channel.title: HELP! What is the best way
channel.description:
What is the best way to go about setting up a starter.
The command starter is faulty, unless it is written to the character file that the integer "starter = 1"
I can't figure out how to add items when you "first" log on.
And I can't get the bank configured for new players...
Any suggestions? Help?

item.title: HELP! What is the best way
item.dc:creator: @picostud picostud
item.description:

Help?

Read full topic
